channel.description: Recent content in 2017 on Vanilla Forums Documentation

item.title: 2017 Cloud Releases
item.description: Release Notes Quarterly VIP releases contain all numbered releases within said quarter. Sometimes bug fixes are backported to the current release, meaning they show up in production earlier than the date noted. Q2 release 6 (Thursday, June 29) Improve load time of Vanilla Statistics dashboard summaries. Triple-A theme: Added missing icons for Reactions. Dashboard: Font tweaks for right panel. Dashboard: Fix inaccurate toggle position for embedding URLs in Posting Settings.
